action.decreaseOffsetButton: Decrease offset to so that next subtitle is at current position. Hold to decrease by 100ms.
action.increaseOffsetButton: Increase offset to so that previous subtitle is at current position. Hold to increase by 100ms.

ankiDialog.audioFileLinkLost: Audio file link lost because of page reload
ankiDialog.cannotUpdateAudio: Audio clip cannot be updated because it is pre-recorded
ankiDialog.foundDuplicateNotes: Found {{count}} notes with word "{{word}}" in field "{{field}}"
ankiDialog.foundNoDuplicateNote: No notes found with word "{{word}}" in field "{{field}}"
ankiDialog.imageFileLinkLost: Image file link lost because of page reload
ankiDialog.title: Anki Export

binds.adjustOffsetToNextSubtitle: Adjust subtitle offset so that next subtitle is at current timestamp
binds.adjustOffsetToPreviousSubtitle: Adjust subtitle offset so that previous subtitle is at current timestamp
binds.adjustOffsetToSubtitle: Adjust subtitle offset so that previous/next subtitle is at current timestamp
binds.ankiExport: Mine current subtitle and open Anki dialog
binds.extensionAnkiDialog: Mine current subtitle and open Anki export dialog. When video is synced without subtitles, starts/stops recording audio.
binds.extensionCopySubtitle: Mine current subtitle. When video is synced without subtitles, starts/stops recording audio.
binds.extensionTakeScreenshot: Manually take screenshot, overriding the one that is automatically taken when mining.
binds.extensionToggleRecording: Manually start/stop audio recording, even when subtitles are loaded.
binds.extensionUpdateLastCard: Update last-created Anki card with asbplayer-captured media. When video is synced without a subtitle file, starts/stops recording audio.
binds.seekToBeginningOfCurrentSubtitle: Seek to beginning of current subtitle
binds.seekToBeginningOfCurrentOrPreviousSubtit: Seek to beginning of current/previous subtitle
binds.takeScreenshot: Manually take screenshot, overriding the one that is automatically taken when mining
binds.toggleAsbplayerBlurTrack: Toggle subtitle track {{trackNumber}} blur in asbplayer
binds.updateLastCard: Update last-created Anki card with asbplayer-captured screenshot, audio, etc.
binds.exportCard: Export card to Anki, bypassing dialog.

error.bothAudioAndVideNotAllowed: Cannot load both an audio and video file simultaneously
error.onlyOneAudioFile: Cannot open two audio files simultaneously
error.onlyOneDirectoryAllowed: Cannot load more than one directory at a time
error.onlyOneVideoFile: Cannot open two video files simultaneously
error.subdirectoriesNotAllowed: Cannot load a directory with subdirectories
error.videoPlayerDragAndDropNotAllowed: Video player cannot receive dropped files. Drop outside of the video frame instead.

settings.autoLoadDetectedSubsFailure: Prompt on failure to auto-load subtitles
settings.openSubtitleList: When loading subtitles, also open subtitle list via the app in a separate tab

pages.syncAllowedAtHash: Path hash regex for subtitle detection
pages.searchShadowRootsForVideoElements: Search shadow roots for video elements
pages.allowVideoElementsWithBlankSrc: Allow video elements with blank src

youtube.targetLanguages: Target language codes for machine translation

videoDataSync.loadSubtitlesFirst: Subtitles must be loaded before you can start mining.
videoDataSync.failedToAutoLoad: Could not auto-load subtitles in your preferred language.
videoDataSync.rememberTrackPreference: Remember these track choices for this site
videoDataSync.ftue: Auto-detected subtitle tracks can be selected here. asbplayer does not know how to detect subtitles on every site. You can always load your own subtitle files.

videoSelect.selectVideo: Select a video element to sync it with asbplayer.
videoSelect.syncBeforeMine: A video element must be synced with asbplayer before it can be mined. Select a video element to sync it with asbplayer.

ftue.welcomeBody: Check out the <0>readme</0> to see how to get started.
ftue.welcomeBody2: Scroll down for a quick intro, or check out the <0>user guide</0>.
ftue.toolbar: Klikk p√• üß©-ikonet i verkt√∏ylinjen og velg <0>asbplayer</0> for √• √•pne asbplayers <1>popup</1>.<2/>Bruk {{pin}}-knappen for √• feste asbplayer til verkt√∏ylinjen for rask tilgang.
ftue.sidePanel: Bruk <0>sidepanelet</0> til √• <1>navigere</1> mellom undertekster, <2>lagre/utvinne</2> undertekster og mer.
ftue.overlayScroll: <0>Rull</0> den h√∏yre kontrollen for √• bytte mellom kontroll for <1>undertekstnavigering</1>, <2>undertekstforskyvning</2> og <3>avspillingshastighet</3>.
ftue.overlay: Bruk <0>videooverlegget</0> til √• <1>lagre/utvinne</1> undertekster, <2>sl√•</2> undertekster av/p√•, <3>bytte avspillingsmodus</3> og mer.
ftue.congrats: Det var det grunnleggende! Pr√∏v deg gjerne frem p√• denne siden.
ftue.loadSubtitles: Det f√∏rste steget n√•r du bruker asbplayer er alltid √• laste undertekster p√• en video. Bruk <0>sidepanelet</0> for √• laste undertekster p√• videoen p√• denne siden.<1/>Tips: <2>sidepanelet</2> kan √•pnes via <3>popupen</3>.
ftue.loadSubtitlesFirefox: Det f√∏rste steget n√•r du bruker asbplayer er alltid √• laste undertekster p√• en video. <0>H√∏yreklikk</0> p√• videoen og finn asbplayers <1>kontekstmeny</1> for √• laste undertekster.
ftue.loadSubtitlesMobile: Det f√∏rste steget n√•r du bruker asbplayer er alltid √• laste undertekster p√• en video. √Öpne sporvelgeren ved √• velge <0>Metheus</0> i menyen <1>utvidelser</1>.
ftue.ankiConnectError: Once you've opened Anki and installed AnkiConnect, clicking the ‚ü≥ button should make the error go away.
ftue.deck: Velg <0>bunken</0> der du vil lagre kortene dine.
ftue.defaultDeck: Hvis du ikke har noen bunker enn√•, kan du <0>opprette standardbunken</0>.
ftue.anki: <0>Anki</0> is the most popular flashcard program in the world. It uses an algorithm called <1>SRS</1> to make learning information very efficient.
ftue.ankiDialog: Use the <0>Anki Export Dialog</0> to create Anki flashcards. In most cases, asbplayer can fill out <1>sentence</1>, <2>image</2>, and <3>audio</3> automatically.
ftue.configureAnki: Click here to configure asbplayer's integration with Anki.
ftue.ankiDialogDefinition: Vanligvis m√• du fylle ut <0>definisjonsfeltet</0> og <1>ordfeltet</1> selv.
ftue.ankiDialogDefinitionHint: Tips: En ordbokutvidelse som <0>Yomitan</0> gj√∏r det veldig enkelt √• sl√• opp definisjoner.
ftue.noteType: Velg <0>notattype</0> for kortene dine. <1>Notattypen</1> bestemmer hvordan forsiden og baksiden av kortene ser ut.
ftue.defaultNoteType: Hvis du ikke har noen notattyper enn√•, kan du <0>opprette standardtypen</0>.
ftue.ankiFields: The rest of the drop-downs configure how content gets mapped into fields of your card.
ftue.testCard: When ready, you can create a test card to see how it looks.

activeTabPermissionRequest.title: Enable audio recording

settings.alwaysPlayOnSubtitleRepeat: Always play (unpause) after invoking above shortcut
settings.autoPausePreferenceHelperText: Does not enable auto-pause. Sets the preference for when to pause when auto-pause is enabled.
settings.corsHelperText: Ensure that {{origin}} is in the webCorsOriginList in your AnkiConnect settings as in this <0>video</0>.
settings.preCacheSubtitleDomHelperText: If enabled, asbplayer will pre-render subtitle text elements in an offscreen element, and re-use those elements for subtitle display. This allows external code to persistently modify subtitle text before it is displayed.
settings.recordWithAudioPlayback: Play audio while recording from local video
settings.subtitleOutlineThicknessHelperText: Adds an outline around subtitle text. If this causes overlapping lines, try using a different font.
settings.subtitleTrackSelectorHelper: Endrer innstillinger for ALLE spor. Innstillinger som allerede har spor-spesifikke verdier skjules.
settings.subtitleBlurDescription: Hides selected subtitle tracks by blurring them. Can be un-blurred on mouse hover.
settings.title: Innstillinger

settings.firefoxExtensionShortcutHelp: Edit this shortcut from the Plugin manager at about:addons.
settings.annotationHelperText: Annotation requires <0>Yomitan API</0> and Anki Connect to function.
settings.dictionaryColorizeSubtitles: Colorize subtitles based on Anki card maturity
settings.dictionaryTokenStylingOutlineHelperText: You may need to set Subtitle Outline Thickness in Subtitle Appearance to 0 for the best results.
